directions: Preheat oven to 350. Take breadstick dough and separate out. Place 3-4 pepperoni slices on half of each breadstick. Fold other half of breadstick over the pepperoni slices. Then, twist breadstick dough 3-4 times. Spray a baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray and place breadsticks on it. Repeat until all breadsticks are assembled. In a small bowl, mix together italian seasoning, cheese, and garlic salt. Sprinkle seasoning mixture over the breadsticks. Bake for 8-10 minutes until golden brown. Remove from oven and allow to cool.
Cook as instructed above. Flash freeze. Place into indicated number of freezer bags, label, and freeze. To serve: reheat in microwave for 30 seconds.
title: Pepperoni Twists
